images.title: Security Shield
images.prompt: A minimal security shield icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). The shield is an outlined shape with 1.5px stroke weight in blue (#3B82F6), rounded corners (8px radius at the bottom points), and a small checkmark inside the shield center. The checkmark uses the same 1.5px blue stroke. The shield interior has a very subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 20% opacity) creating a duotone effect. Generous white space around the icon — at least 15% padding from bounds. Clean vector style, geometric shapes only, round stroke caps and joins. No shadows, no gradients, no glow effects. Simple, modern, trustworthy.

images.title: Lightning Speed
images.prompt: A minimal lightning bolt icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). The bolt is a simple geometric zigzag shape with 1.5px stroke weight in blue (#3B82F6), sharp angles softened by round joins. Two small horizontal motion lines (1px stroke, #CBD5E1 gray) trail behind the bolt suggesting speed and movement. The bolt interior has a subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 25% opacity). Generous white space — at least 15% padding. Clean vector style, geometric construction, round stroke caps. No shadows, no 3D effects. Dynamic yet clean and minimal.

images.title: Real-time Sync
images.prompt: A minimal sync/refresh icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). Two curved arrows forming a circular rotation pattern, each arrow is a 180-degree arc with an arrowhead pointing in the direction of flow. Strokes are 1.5px weight in blue (#3B82F6) with round caps. The arrows create a complete circle when combined, with small gaps between them. Subtle motion suggested by the circular flow. Clean geometric construction, no fill on the arrows. Generous white space — at least 15% padding from bounds. No shadows, no gradients. Modern, continuous, connected feel.

images.title: Analytics Chart
images.prompt: A minimal bar chart icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). Three vertical bars of increasing height (left to right, suggesting growth), sitting on a thin horizontal baseline. Bars have 1.5px stroke weight in blue (#3B82F6) with subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 25% opacity). Bars have small rounded tops (4px radius). A thin trend line (1px stroke, #10B981 emerald) angles upward across the bars suggesting positive growth. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. Clean vector style, geometric shapes, round stroke caps. No shadows, no 3D effects. Data-driven, optimistic, clear.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents

images.title: API Access
images.prompt: A minimal API/code icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). Angled brackets (< >) as the main element with 1.5px stroke weight in blue (#3B82F6), round caps. Between the brackets, a small forward slash (/) in the same style. Two small circular nodes (4px diameter, blue fill) positioned at the outer tips of the brackets, connected by thin dotted lines (1px, #CBD5E1 gray) suggesting connectivity and data exchange. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. Clean vector construction, geometric and technical. No shadows, no gradients. Developer-friendly, technical, accessible.

images.title: Cloud Storage
images.prompt: A minimal cloud icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). A simple cloud shape made of overlapping circles creating a fluffy silhouette, outlined with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6), round joins. A small upward arrow centered below the cloud (or emerging from it) indicating upload/storage, same blue stroke. The cloud has a very subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 20% opacity). Clean geometric construction — the cloud is built from 3-4 overlapping circles. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. No shadows, no 3D effects. Reliable, modern, effortless.

images.title: Privacy Lock
images.prompt: A minimal padlock icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). A rounded rectangle body (8px corner radius) with a U-shaped shackle on top. Strokes are 1.5px weight in blue (#3B82F6), round caps and joins. The lock body has a subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 25% opacity). A small keyhole shape (circle with small triangle below) centered on the lock body in the same blue. Clean geometric construction. Generous white space — at least 15% padding from bounds. No shadows, no gradients. Secure, trustworthy, simple.

images.title: Team Collaboration
images.prompt: A minimal team/people icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). Two simplified person silhouettes side by side — each is a circle (head) above a rounded shoulder shape. The front/primary person uses 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6), the second person slightly behind uses 1.5px stroke in lighter gray (#94A3B8) to create depth without heaviness. Both figures use round stroke caps. Subtle overlap suggesting collaboration and unity. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. Clean vector style, geometric shapes. No shadows, no facial features. Collaborative, friendly, professional.

images.title: Automation Gear
images.prompt: A minimal automation icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). A gear/cog shape with 6-8 rounded teeth, outlined with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6). Inside the gear, a small play triangle (pointing right) indicating automation/action. The gear has subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 20% opacity). Teeth have softly rounded tips (4px radius). A small circular motion indicator (dotted arc) near the gear suggesting continuous operation, in light gray (#CBD5E1). Generous white space — at least 15% padding. Clean vector construction. No shadows. Efficient, automatic, smart.

style.focal_point: Center — the gear with play symbol

images.title: 24/7 Support
images.prompt: A minimal customer support icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). A headset shape — two ear cups connected by a curved headband, outlined with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6), round caps and joins. A small chat bubble emerges from one side with three small dots inside (typing indicator), the bubble uses the same blue stroke with subtle fill (#DBEAFE at 25% opacity). Clean geometric construction — headband is a smooth arc, ear cups are rounded rectangles. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. No shadows. Helpful, responsive, always available.

images.title: Mobile Ready
images.prompt: A minimal smartphone icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). A rounded rectangle (12px corner radius) representing a phone in portrait orientation, outlined with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6). Inside the phone screen area, a small checkmark indicating mobile compatibility/success. The phone body has very subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 15% opacity). A thin horizontal line near the bottom suggests the home area. Clean geometric construction. Generous white space — at least 15% padding from bounds. No shadows, no 3D effects. Modern, responsive, accessible.

images.title: Easy Integration
images.prompt: A minimal integration/puzzle icon on a pure white background (#FFFFFF). Two puzzle pieces connecting together — each piece is a rounded square with one protruding tab and one receiving indent. The left piece uses 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6) with light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 25% opacity). The right piece uses 1.5px stroke in emerald (#10B981) with light green fill (#D1FAE5 at 25% opacity). The pieces are shown mid-connection, almost touching, suggesting seamless integration. Round stroke caps and joins, 8px corner radius on outer edges. Generous white space — at least 15% padding. No shadows. Connected, seamless, compatible.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents

images.title: User Onboarding Flow
images.prompt: A horizontal process flow diagram on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing 4 onboarding steps from left to right. Each step is a circle (48px diameter) with a step number inside (1, 2, 3, 4) in semibold geometric sans-serif. Step 1 (Sign Up): user icon inside, blue fill (#3B82F6), white number. Step 2 (Profile): person icon, outlined in blue, white fill. Step 3 (Connect): link/chain icon, outlined in blue, white fill. Step 4 (Dashboard): grid icon, outlined in blue, white fill. Steps connected by thin horizontal lines (1px stroke, #CBD5E1) with small arrow indicators. Short labels below each circle in medium weight (#64748B): 'Sign Up', 'Profile', 'Connect', 'Dashboard'. Equal spacing between steps. The active step (Step 1) has blue fill, others are outlined only. Clean vector style, generous white space above and below the flow. No shadows, no gradients.

style.focal_point: Left side — the first step as entry point

images.title: Data Pipeline Flow
images.prompt: A horizontal data pipeline diagram on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing 4 stages from left to right. Each stage is a rounded rectangle (64px wide, 48px tall, 8px radius) with an icon inside. Stage 1 (Input): database cylinder icon, outlined blue (#3B82F6). Stage 2 (Process): gear icon, blue fill, white icon. Stage 3 (Transform): arrows crossing icon, outlined blue. Stage 4 (Output): export/download icon, outlined blue. Stages connected by arrows — thin lines (1.5px stroke, #94A3B8) with chevron arrowheads pointing right. Data flow particles (small 4px dots in blue, #60A5FA) along the connection lines suggesting movement. Labels below each stage in medium weight (#64748B): 'Input', 'Process', 'Transform', 'Output'. The Process stage (center-left) is highlighted with blue fill. Equal spacing, clean vector style, generous margins. No heavy shadows.

images.title: Payment Checkout Flow
images.prompt: A horizontal payment flow diagram on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing 4 steps from left to right. Each step is a rounded square (52px, 12px radius) with an icon inside. Step 1 (Cart): shopping cart icon, outlined blue (#3B82F6). Step 2 (Checkout): credit card icon, outlined blue. Step 3 (Confirm): shield with checkmark, outlined blue. Step 4 (Success): checkmark in circle, emerald fill (#10B981), white checkmark. Steps connected by thin dashed lines (1px, #CBD5E1) with small arrow indicators. The final Success step uses green to indicate completion. Step numbers (1-4) in small circles above each main icon. Labels below in medium weight (#64748B): 'Cart', 'Checkout', 'Confirm', 'Success'. Progress bar underneath showing completion (75% filled in blue, 25% in light gray). Clean vector style, equal spacing, generous white space. No heavy shadows.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents
style.focal_point: Right side — the Success completion state

images.title: Support Ticket Journey
images.prompt: A horizontal support flow diagram on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing 4 stages from left to right. Each stage is a circle (48px diameter) with an icon inside. Stage 1 (Issue): warning triangle icon, outlined in gray (#64748B). Stage 2 (Ticket): document/ticket icon, outlined blue (#3B82F6). Stage 3 (Agent): headset icon, blue fill, white icon — this is the active/current stage. Stage 4 (Resolved): checkmark in circle, emerald outline (#10B981). Stages connected by curved connector lines (1.5px stroke, #CBD5E1) with subtle arrow indicators. A small chat bubble near the Agent stage suggests active communication. Labels below each stage in medium weight (#64748B): 'Issue', 'Ticket', 'Agent', 'Resolved'. The flow shows progression from problem to solution. Clean vector style, generous margins, equal spacing. No heavy shadows or gradients.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents

images.title: Growth Metrics
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing growth and success. Central element is an upward-trending line chart with 2px stroke in blue (#3B82F6), showing clear upward trajectory from bottom-left to top-right. Three data points marked with filled circles (8px, blue). At the peak, a small star burst or celebration element (thin lines radiating outward in emerald #10B981) suggesting achievement. Below the chart line, a subtle area fill (gradient from #DBEAFE at 30% to transparent). Small floating elements: an upward arrow, a percentage symbol, tiny confetti dots — all in muted colors (#94A3B8, #60A5FA). The composition feels celebratory but clean. Generous white space, clean vector style. No heavy shadows. Optimistic, successful, data-driven.

style.lighting: Flat with subtle highlight on peak
style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents
style.focal_point: Upper right — the growth peak with celebration elements

images.title: Global Reach
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing global connectivity. Central element is a simplified globe — a circle (80px diameter) with subtle latitude/longitude grid lines (1px stroke, #E2E8F0). Several small location dots (6px diameter) placed on the globe surface in blue (#3B82F6) representing different regions. Thin curved connection lines (1px stroke, #60A5FA at 60% opacity) arc between the dots showing connectivity. A subtle ring orbiting the globe (1px dashed stroke, #CBD5E1) suggests worldwide reach. Small floating elements around the globe: tiny plane icon, wifi symbol, location pin — all in muted blue tones. The globe has a very subtle shadow underneath (0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.06)). Clean vector style, generous white space. Connected, worldwide, accessible.

style.lighting: Flat with very subtle depth shadow
style.focal_point: Center — the globe with connection points

images.title: Cost Savings
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing cost savings. Central element is a stylized piggy bank or coin stack — simplified geometric shapes with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6). A prominent downward arrow (emerald #10B981, 2px stroke) next to a dollar/currency symbol indicating cost reduction. Small floating coins (circles with line detail) in various sizes scattered around, some in blue, some in light gray (#CBD5E1), suggesting money saved. A small percentage badge showing '-30%' or similar in a rounded rectangle (emerald background, white text). Subtle decorative elements: small sparkles, tiny checkmarks. The composition conveys savings and financial benefit. Clean vector style, generous margins. No heavy shadows. Economical, beneficial, smart.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents
style.focal_point: Center — the savings indicator with downward arrow

images.title: Time Saved
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing time efficiency. Central element is a clock face — a circle (72px diameter) with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6), simple hour markers (small lines at 12, 3, 6, 9 positions), and two hands pointing to roughly 10:10. A fast-forward or speed indicator element: two small chevrons (>>) in emerald (#10B981) next to the clock suggesting acceleration. Motion lines (1px stroke, #CBD5E1) behind the clock suggesting speed. Small floating elements: tiny hourglass, stopwatch icon, lightning bolt — all in muted tones. A small badge showing 'Save 5hrs/week' or similar time stat. The clock has subtle light blue fill (#DBEAFE at 15% opacity). Clean vector style, generous white space. No heavy shadows. Efficient, fast, valuable.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents
style.focal_point: Center — the clock with speed indicators

images.title: Active Users
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing user community. Central element is a group of 5-7 simplified user avatars — circles (varying sizes: 32px, 40px, 48px) with simple person silhouettes inside. The avatars slightly overlap, creating a clustered community feel. Primary avatar in front uses blue fill (#3B82F6), others use various tints: light blue (#DBEAFE), light gray (#F1F5F9), and outlined styles. Small activity indicators: tiny green dots (online status), small notification badges, chat bubbles — suggesting active engagement. A subtle arc or wave shape behind the group in very light blue (#DBEAFE at 30% opacity) creates cohesion. All avatars use 1.5px strokes where outlined. Clean vector style, generous margins. Community-focused, active, engaged.

images.title: Reliability Uptime
images.prompt: A larger infographic illustration on a pure white background (#FFFFFF) showing reliability and uptime. Central element is a server/database icon — a rounded rectangle stack (3 stacked shapes suggesting server rack) with 1.5px stroke in blue (#3B82F6). A prominent checkmark or shield overlay in emerald (#10B981) indicating verified/protected status. Small status indicator lights on the server (tiny circles: green for active, subtle gray for others). A circular badge nearby showing '99.9%' in bold typography (blue or emerald). Subtle uptime graph element: a flat horizontal line suggesting consistent availability, with tiny pulse/heartbeat indicator. Small floating elements: wifi signal, lightning bolt (power), shield — all in muted tones. Clean vector style, generous white space. Reliable, stable, trustworthy.

style.color_temperature: Neutral with blue and green accents
style.focal_point: Center — the server with uptime indicator
